title: Natural Language Database Querying
description: Turn plain English questions into executing database queries using a multi-step AI pipeline.

mechanics.description: Translates your natural language request (e.g., 'get users over 25') into a raw SQL query string.
Extracts *only* the SQL code from Gemini's markdown response to ensure clean execution.
Takes the cleaned SQL string and executes it against the database, returning the actual results.

add: your a sqlite agent, you only output dqlite query.
gel all the users from users table whose age is above 25.

title: Automated Data Analysis
description: Fetch raw data from your database and have an AI agent perform insightful analysis on it automatically.

mechanics.description: Fetches raw rows from the database (e.g., all users).
Converts the database array result into a string format that the AI can read.
Combines the data string with an analysis prompt (e.g., 'Analyze this data...').
Receives the combined context and outputs a text summary or insight about the data.

add: your a data analysis agent, analysis the provided data.

title: Todo Reminder Assistant
description: Fetches your TODO item from an API and turns it into a natural reminder.

mechanics.description: Fetches a TODO item from a REST API using the ID you provide.
Converts the HTTP response into a JSON string so Gemini can read it cleanly.
Takes the API response and turns it into a friendly reminder message.

add: This is the response from my TODO API. Convert it into a reminder about what I need to do.
